name: HowmanydayssinceCarolinahasbeatenClemson
0:
”Alexa, ask clemson tigers for the amount of days its been since they lost to carolina”
”Alexa, ask clemson tigers how long since carolina has beaten us”
”Alexa, open Clemson Tigers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: clemson tigers
des: This skill is used to find out how many days it's been since the Carolina Gamecocks have beaten the Clemson Tigers in college football. By saying one of the phrases below, Alexa will inform you of the amount of days it's been.
